programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Aimee Parker is moving across the Atlantic to marry her American fiance Andy. Her parents Lynn and Dave have decided to buy a place in Orlando, which will not only be Aimee and Andys first house, but also a holiday home for her mum and dad.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: First to host in Hertfordshire is Iranian born Amir Hezarah, whose strategy is to be on his best behaviour for his night, before turning into the `real Amir for the rest of the week.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Neat freak Claire Diamond is the second host from Hertfordshire. She hopes to excite her guests with a starter of crispy chilli chicken, a main of roast rack of lamb with potato dauphinoise, and a huge dessert of panacotta, meringue and chocolate cheesecake, while trying to keep her house spotlessly clean. The guests all seem to appreciate her menu apart from Amir.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Posh boy and wannabe pop star Charles Maximilian Winnington Leftwich is the third host from Hertfordshire. He hopes his elaborate menu and outdoor music performance will earn him top marks, but its not an easy ride for the young host who lives at home with his mum. The guests struggle with his starter, the rain threatens to spoil the BBQ, and a row develops about how much money Charles receives from his parents.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: `Earth mother Diane Mitham is the fourth nights host. So far the week has been dominated by Amir and constant arguing, so shes determined to let her food do the talking and impress her guests with a simple menu.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the final day of the competition in Hertfordshire and the turn of feisty hairdresser Mel Steel to demonstrate her culinary skills with a mix of French and Caribbean dishes. programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: Sionnach agus Maigheach
programme.desc: Tusk is painting a portrait of Ping Wing. Well, hes trying to. Frustrated, he throws away his attempts, which float through the air and end up with the other animals in the forest. They are convinced these strange drawings must be maps and a great treasure hunt begins.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Seren shows the other Abadas how good she is at counting when they are sent in search of a scale.

programme.title: AH-AH
programme.desc: No-no wake up hungry and goes to the fridge to find what little he has is expired. Magaiver offers him some of his food, but No-No would rather visit his secret stash of snacks. Along the way, his friends offer him carrot treats.

programme.title: Cleasan Ataidh and Tilidh
programme.desc: Abney is decorating the trees and Teal has found an old tyre to do tricks with. The tyre gets stuck around Bops tummy and Teal, Abney, Neep and the Poc-Pocs have to think what to do.

programme.title: Pompon Am Mathan Beag
programme.desc: Georges takes Pompon to learn to fish, bear-style, but its not easy to catch fish with his little paws. Fortunately, with a little imagination, Pompon finds another way to bring the meal back to the den.

programme.title: Stòiridh
programme.sub-title: Am Mathan, am Piàna, an Cù agus an Fhidheall
programme.desc: Alec MacDonald reads `Am Mathan, am Piàna, an Cù agus an Fhidheall written by David Litchfield and translated into Gaelic by Jo Macdonald.

programme.title: An Doimhne
programme.desc: Saoil a bheil n Orca Dhorch fo smachd thaibhsean? Chan eil sgeul air duine - càite bheil iad uile? Is the Dark Orca under the influence of ghosts, where is everyone? Theres no sign of anyone, where are they all?

programme.title: Coig Criomagan
programme.desc: Ellen Macdonald introduces a selection of her favourite facts.

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pòl Ploc
programme.desc: Following an incident with the school photocopier, Dave must round up a horde of photocopied baby Spud twins.

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pòl Ploc
programme.desc: Dave uses a magnet to search for treasure, but ends up attracting all of the towns metal, and not just the small stuff.

programme.title: Mach à Seo!
programme.desc: Ramsay travels to Perthshire to bungee jump off the Garry bridge at Killiecrankie.

programme.title: SpeakGaelic
programme.desc: Fr Jarek Kwiecień, originally from Poland, talks to Joy in the studio. Calum Maclean visits Oban at the depot of the Northern Lighthouse Board to learn about their work.

programme.title: An Là
programme.desc: Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Presenting local, national, and international news and information.

programme.title: An Cuan Sgith
programme.desc: Anne Lundon goes in search of stories and people connected to the famous stretch of sea, known as The Minch.

programme.title: Am Buabhall Ameireaganach
programme.desc: By the late 1880s, the buffalo teeters on extinction. A diverse and unlikely collection of Americans start a movement that rescues the mammal from extinction.

programme.title: Fraochy Bay
programme.desc: Torquil Farquhar has just been left stranded on a dummy iceberg in Fraochy Bay as the lifeboat abandons its training session and heads off to a real life emergency. A local crofter is being held hostage by his mutinous sheep.

programme.title: Sona
programme.desc: Tha Vicky Kilgour, le cuid meas air sauna, a gabhail a rathaid air costa an iar na h-Alba agus i a sireadh sunnd is toileachas, le a caraid Donnchadh Dòmhnallach na cuideachd. Vicky Kilgour is hitting the road along the west coast of Scotland.

programme.title: Sar Sgeoil
programme.desc: Cathy san eilean Chanadach a bhrosnaich an leabhar iomraiteach Anne of Green Gables. Cathy visits the Canadian island that inspired the much-loved novel, `Anne of Green Gables.

programme.title: Dàna: Scotlands Wild Side
programme.sub-title: Bodach an Stòir/Old Man of Stoer
programme.desc: Coinneach Rankin travels to Sutherland to tackle a challenge that has inspired generations of climbers, the Old Man of Stoer. Tides, weather and the support of a new partner will all need to align in order to gain the summit of this great sea stack.

programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.

programme.title: Rikki
programme.desc: A centenary celebration of the life and legacy of Rikki Fulton, one of Scotlands most beloved comic actors. Ashley Jensen narrates an affectionate tribute to one of Scotlands funniest comedians, Rikki Fulton. Its 100 years since Rikki first made an entrance on to the world stage and 20 years since he bowed out. For decades hes been making the nation laugh with his rubber face, razor sharp wit and laconic demeanour.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough takes a look at life deep undersea. A 30-tonne whale shark gorges on a school of fish and a unique overhead camera reveals the speed of common dolphins. Descending into the abyss, deep sea octopus fly with wings and vampire squid use bioluminescence to create a colour display. Time-lapse footage from 2,000m down captures eels, crabs and giant isopods eating.

programme.title: Tribe
programme.desc: While living with the Sanema people of the Venezuelan Amazon, Bruce Parry takes part in a shamanistic festival.

programme.title: This Is BBC Four
programme.desc: BBC FOUR is the BBC channel for people who want more. More depth, more range, more to stimulate the mind.

programme.title: Earths Natural Wonders
programme.desc: In the high Himalaya, join yak-herder Thokmay Lowa and his small group as he steers his herd through one of the regions extreme mountain passes. In the Canadian Arctic, 63-year-old Minnie Nappaaluk and her granddaughter Eva embark on one of the most hazardous expeditions for food: the mussel harvest. In the blistering Australian outback, the only way to efficiently round up cattle herds on vast farms is through the use of helicopter cowboys like Chris Weyand.

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Showgirl Lorelei and best friend Dorothy embark upon a boat trip to Paris, where Lorelei intends to marry millionaire Gus Esmond. En route, the girls are bedevilled by private detective Malone, hired by Esmonds father to make certain that Lorelei isnt just another gold-digger. When Dorothy falls in love with the poverty-stricken Malone, Lorelei decides to find her pal a wealthier potential husband.

programme.title: Parkinson
programme.sub-title: Harry Secombe, Harold Robbins and Anita Loos
programme.desc: Michael Parkinson chats to Harry Secombe, Harold Robbins and Anita Loos.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: A dramatic reconstruction of the World War II rout at Dunkirk. The Allied defeat and the subsequent frantic evacuation is told through the experiences of three different characters: a cockney corporal and his men separated from their unit; a newspaper reporter who moves from cool detachment to being willing to lay down his life; and a civilian whose eyes are opened by the dramatic events.

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: A retrospective look at television appearances made over the years by the Oscar-winning actor Sir John Mills, capturing the milestones and highlights of his life and career.

programme.title: The Moment of Proof
programme.desc: A single piece of A4 paper found on top of a hidden fax machine gives police the number of a shipping container used to smuggle millions of pounds worth of drugs from Thailand. The men responsible for bringing it into the UK had been under covert surveillance for months, but until the fax was discovered, there was no way of proving the gangs involvement in the international drugs trade.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Death gets a good look around as he reveals his creepiest moments - a Tudor family show the extent of their ghostly superstitions and the Vikings demonstrate how to become truly terrifying to enemies. Death himself is joined by some rather creepy friends to sing about his favourite scary things.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: The Saxon gods form an unlikely team of superheroes and famous astronaut Neil Armstrong reveals his new weight loss programme. Later we meet Georgian Londons crime-fighting genius, and Rosa Parks sings about her struggle for equality.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May are set the task of creating a TV advert for Volkswagen. Despite vowing to work together to deliver a classic piece of advertising, the boys quickly fall out on set. Meanwhile, Richard Hammond looks for an alternative to boring Germanic sports saloons and ends up going mostly sideways in the new Vauxhall VXR8 Bathurst. Plus, American chat show legend Jay Leno is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Bad Nanny
programme.desc: We trace back through the years to uncover how Samanthas cons became increasingly audacious, building up to her role as a `nanny who was hiding a secret. We discover how she gained the trust of families, only to betray them in devastating ways.

programme.title: Bad Nanny
programme.desc: The scam deepens as Samantha Cookes targets vulnerable families, masquerades as a dying author, and defrauds the Irish state, until her victims unite to expose her.

programme.title: Sound of Metal
programme.desc: Ruben, a drummer, is distraught when he begins losing his hearing. However, things take a turn when he meets Joe, who heads a community comprising of people with hearing impairment.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May are set the task of creating a TV advert for Volkswagen. Despite vowing to work together to deliver a classic piece of advertising, the boys quickly fall out on set. Meanwhile, Richard Hammond looks for an alternative to boring Germanic sports saloons and ends up going mostly sideways in the new Vauxhall VXR8 Bathurst. Plus, American chat show legend Jay Leno is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Disaster at Sea: The Piper Alpha Story
programme.desc: Piper Alpha burns, and the platform begins to collapse. With 167 men dead and just a handful of survivors, grief turns to fury, and the fight for justice begins back home.

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: A mysterious crate sweeps ashore to help the honeymooners get better acquainted. Tensions spill over at the first Couples Cove, before Davina delivers a dilemma that could change one pairs fate forever.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: It is the last quarter-final, and the best cooks from the weeks heats are back with one thing in their sights, a place in knockout week. Food writer Leyla Kazim makes a welcome return to set the brief, and she has one thing on her mind, beans.

programme.title: The Interview
programme.sub-title: Celebrities: Irvine Welsh: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Irvine Welshs first novel `Trainspotting achieved cult status and was turned into a hit film. Its depiction of the lives of heroin addicts in Leith tapped into the zeitgeist of the 1990s. The author has written a sequel, catching up with the exploits of the gang. He speaks to Katie Razzall about class, influence of music in his writing, and why he worries culture is dying.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Mark Wright, Asher Edwards and Maxine Dwyer help Sammy, a mum overwhelmed by clutter, transform her home into a functional sanctuary.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Mark Wright, Asher Edwards and Maxine Dwyer help Sabrina reclaim her home from mould and clutter.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: A widow wants to sell her collection to fund a family holiday. Robin restores a tiny rocking chair and tends to a cheetah, while Izzie strikes gold. Expect a huge shock at auction.

programme.title: Marcus Wareings Tales from a Kitchen Garden
programme.desc: Marcus Wareing embraces a slower pace of life down at his Sussex smallholding. Setting out to expand the range of produce and bring in new livestock, his first additions are some new pigs, but he needs to choose animals that will provide him with the best possible meat.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Contestants compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Bridge of Lies
programme.desc: Ross Kemp presents as a team of four family members, Emmanuel, Michael, Debbie and Vivian, take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one they all face the bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: London and South East England: Starters and Fish
programme.desc: Four chefs compete for London and South East England with canapes, starters and fish dishes inspired by the Olympics and Paralympics, all hoping to cook at a banquet to wish Team GB athletes luck as they head for Paris 2024.

programme.title: Cornwall: This Fishing Life
programme.desc: Padstow is well known for its tourist industry, but theres another lucrative industry here that few visitors are aware of. Each year, Padstows fishermen land hundreds of tonnes of brown crab. But the vast majority bypass the town altogether.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Coming from Tilbury Docks in Essex, antique experts Elizabeth Talbot and Philip Serrell search for items to take off to auction. Elizabeth finds a mint toy car collection and Phillip unearths a trench periscope from the First World War. Paul Martin uncovers the explosive history of Britains biggest gunpowder factory.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Every day this week, previous contestants Sian Gibson, Jean Johansson, Iain Stirling and Rav Wilding take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo resumes his railway exploration of North Wales on the Isle of Anglesey, where the briny waters of the Menai Strait are being used to create a Welsh gastronomic delight.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Rita Simons and Laila Morse have travelled from the East End to the West Country. Aided and abetted by a couple of antiques experts, fellow London resident Catherine Southon and Yorkshires own Angus Ashworth, they get about in a Mercedes 220.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: A frantic mother alerts the lifeguards after six teenagers are cut off by the tide. The Anstruther crew race to the rescue of a female paddleboarder. The reports of a clothed person entering the water lead the Selsey crew to a late-night search.

programme.title: The Newsreader
programme.desc: In 1989, Helen and Dale are forced into direct competition as they fight to become number one. Helen is given her own current affairs program, and Dale becomes the biggest name in news with a Gold Logie nomination.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: A tigress is chosen to found a new dynasty. Airlifted from her home in an Indian park to life in a new reserve, Baghani the tigress must fight with leopards for territory and learn to hunt dangerous wild boar. Also released is Rajore, a young male.

programme.title: Limbs in the Loch: Catching a Killer
programme.desc: After 12 months of legal wrangling, William Beggs is finally extradited from the Netherlands to Scotland, where he will be tried for the murder of 18-year-old Barry Wallace at the High Court of Edinburgh.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Disaster at Sea: The Piper Alpha Story
programme.desc: With Piper Alpha gone, survivors evidence becomes key to the truth. The inquiry reveals fatal errors, ignored warnings and failed systems. Will there be justice?

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: In Portaferry, Northern Ireland, the crew face an increasingly urgent search for two kayakers who have been blown out to sea in 50 mile an hour winds. Reports of a missing female swimmer near Selsey lead to a late night search in near total darkness.

programme.title: UFOs Declassified
programme.desc: In the 80s and 90s, sightings of dark, triangular flying objects began to occur across the world - many incidents remaining unexplained.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: From the beginning of recorded history there have been stories about beings with superhuman strength, super-sonic speed and supernatural abilities.Is it possible that these stories are based on extra-terrestrial beings that once lived on Earth?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: One of the most prolific inventors of the 20th century, Nikola Tesla shepherded mankind to a new industrial era and laid the groundwork for todays technological age. Is it possible that he was influenced by some otherworldly design?

programme.title: Deep Water Salvage
programme.desc: Crews work around the clock to build the worlds largest underwater concrete bed to salvage the Costa Concordia. Operating in secrecy, teams work under high security to repair one of the worlds most iconic cruise liners.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: An argument with Seth leaves Ashley in tears and Karen attempts to broker a peace deal, Bobby J takes a joyride on two-story tractor, and a watch snob finds himself on Seths bad side.

programme.title: Dickinsons Real Deal
programme.desc: David Dickinson is joined by antiques dealers to appraise items brought in by members of the public. Among the items under scrutiny are a Lowry print, artefacts and timbers relating to HMS Victory and a vinaigrette.

programme.title: Dickinsons Real Deal
programme.desc: Coalville in Leicestershire is the location today for David Dickinson and his team of James Layte, Tony Geering, Alison Chapman and Ian Towning. Amongst the items brought in are an Art Nouveau stamp box, a veterinary kit from the 1800s and a watch bracelet that once belonged to blonde bombshell actress Diana Dors.

programme.desc: Henry and Sam are, as always, on the quest for a nice little earner. Here, they visit Neils emporium full of trinketry, and snaffle a bargain or two to restore and sell at one of their favourite autojumbles.

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: A glamorous duo outbid the boys. Meanwhile, a rash bid on some trash yields some shocking results, and could a bid on an ancient artefact net them some big gains?

programme.desc: When Les puts the kibosh on Seths outlandish plan to boost business, father and son head to the race track to decide whos boss.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn

programme.title: UFOs Declassified

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick and Chum flip out when Spencer stops by the shop with a few vintage items; Rick calls in actor Dennis Quaid to help authenticate a signed poster for his upcoming movie.

programme.title: Junk and Disorderly

programme.title: Storage Hunters

programme.desc: Scott spends a lot of money on an Oktoberfest bin; the Alvarado brothers bid on collectibles; T Money rides away with a big win; Brandon and Lori investigate a bin.

programme.desc: Ancient people described monsters and visitors from the sky; these beings might be aliens, or the product of alien experimentation on humans.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.sub-title: Caddy the Cadborosaurus, the Lubbock Lights, and Living Mummy

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Its Erin Burnetts turn to step out front and try to maintain a viable viewer presence for CNN in the weekday news arena. But the former CNBC anchor wont worry about ratings for her hourlong general news program, comparing that burden to "death." Instead, shell concern herself with translating world events into relevant information for viewers, paying close attention to such topics as the Middle East and womens issues. "I want people to say that our show is smart. I want our show to be authentic", Burnett says in a promo. "I want our show to have courage". Left unsaid, of course, is that she wants her show to have a big audience, too.

programme.title: 13 rue Madeleine
programme.desc: Rough and tough OSS agent Bob Sharkey oversees a special mission to determine the location of the factory where the Nazis are manufacturing their notorious flying bombs. When a treacherous double agent murders one of the OSS recruits, Bob leaves London to personally lead the mission, centred in Paris. Based on actual OSS accounts and use of intelligence agency footage.

programme.title: Django Unchained Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Quentin Tarantino and stars Samuel L Jackson, Christoph Waltz, Jamie Foxx and Kerry Washington talk about making the western adventure `Django Unchained, set against a backdrop of slavery.

programme.title: Patton
programme.desc: Biopic of the US general who successfully fought the Germans in the latter days of World War II, George S Patton, but who was frequently in conflict with his superiors.

programme.desc: A cynical TV weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again when he goes on location to the small town of Punxsutawney to film a report about their annual Groundhog Day. programme.title: Fremont
programme.desc: Formerly a translator for the United States military in Afghanistan, Donya rebuilds her life in San Francisco. She works for a Chinese fortune cookie factory and decides to send out a special message in one of the cookies.

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Casey sails to Philadelphia to tackle the epic Classic Whale Challenge, a 6 kg bagel sandwich stuffed with cream cheese, nova salmon, whitefish, tomatoes and onions.

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Casey travels to Seattle where he climbs a Mount Fuji-sized burger and takes on seven terrifyingly spicy Buffalo wings that have defeated over 5,000 challengers.

programme.title: Guys Grocery Games
programme.desc: Guy Fieri invites three wilderness chefs to hunt through Flavortown Market and prepare dishes featuring wild game, while playing GGGs wild games. They make fireside favourites and create an elevated backcountry dinner for a chance to win $20,000.

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers Go North
programme.desc: The Hairy Bikers continue their northern odyssey in the county of Northumberland. Its an area that Si knows well, having holidayed there many times throughout his childhood, and he is keen to introduce Dave to some of the producers and chefs he has got to know over the years. Starting in the seaside town of Amble, where they eat fresh seafood from the North Sea, they head to a potato farm at the foot of the Cheviot Hills that grows nine different varieties of potato.

programme.title: Rachel Allen: Bake!
programme.desc: Todays treats include Tarte Tatin, with caramelised apples. In Callandar, baker Tom Lewis reveals the secrets of his delicious bread.

programme.title: Rachel Allen: Bake!
programme.desc: On the menu: a gorgeous coconut macaroon tart. Plus, Rachel meets master patissier Eric Lanlard, and learns the secrets behind his flamboyant creations.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond takes potluck classics to the next level; she makes crowd-pleasing Chorizo Baked Beans, elevates a Napa Cabbage Salad, puts a new spin on a favourite with Smashed Potato Salad and creates a Lemon Blueberry Ice Box Cake.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Award-winning blogger and best-selling cookbook author Ree Drummond shares her special brand of home cooking from down on the ranch. She creates menus for every occasion, from last-minute family suppers to elegant celebrations.

programme.title: Jamies 15 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Jamie cooks Swedish meatballs, celeriac and spinach rice, plus pasta pesto, garlic and rosemary chicken.

programme.title: Jamies 15 Minute Meals
programme.sub-title: Green Tea Salmon and Modern Greek Salad
programme.desc: Featuring green tea salmon, coconut rice and miso greens, plus modern Greek salad, spinach, chickpea and feta parcels.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers: Route 66
programme.desc: For the last leg of their route 66 odyssey, the bikers are going west to California, the golden state. First, they make a small detour to the city of light, Las Vegas. Si and Dave have been invited by one of the youngest executive chefs in the country to learn how to make the best mashed potato in the world.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The remaining bakers have their knowledge of pastry tested in the eighth week, with a savoury take on a French classic, a multi-layered Moroccan technical, and a towering showstopper that requires not only pastry skills, but engineering too.

programme.title: 30-Minute Meals
programme.sub-title: Its Not Delivery, Its Cast Iron Skillet Pan Pizza
programme.desc: Rachael Ray makes her favourite pizza at home in a cast iron skillet; spicy sausage, chili flakes and honey liven up her sausage pizza, and her fennel and olive salad is a bright, refreshing complement to the hot and cheesy pizza.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by pal and Michelin-starred chef Mark Jordan, and together they set out to explore the delights of Jersey aboard mini motor bikes. James samples the delights of one of Jerseys most famous exports, the Jersey Royal potato, and he uses them to cook up a squid risotto with a difference. Mark Jordan gets a lesson in oyster shucking, and James discovers an island speciality: Jersey black butter, which he uses to create a delicious sweet treat.

programme.title: James Martins French Adventure
programme.desc: Jamess journey continues in St Tropez. On board a yacht, James makes the most of the local seafood, serving it en papillotte, before visiting old friend Michel Roux.

programme.title: Rachel Allen: Bake!
programme.desc: Todays treats include Tarte Tatin, with caramelised apples. In Callandar, baker Tom Lewis reveals the secrets of his delicious bread.

programme.title: Rachel Allen: Bake!
programme.desc: On the menu: a gorgeous coconut macaroon tart. Plus, Rachel meets master patissier Eric Lanlard, and learns the secrets behind his flamboyant creations.

programme.desc: Award-winning blogger and best-selling cookbook author Ree Drummond shares her special brand of home cooking from down on the ranch. She creates menus for every occasion, from last-minute family suppers to elegant celebrations.

programme.title: 30-Minute Meals
programme.sub-title: Its Not Delivery, Its Cast Iron Skillet Pan Pizza
programme.desc: Rachael Ray makes her favourite pizza at home in a cast iron skillet; spicy sausage, chili flakes and honey liven up her sausage pizza, and her fennel and olive salad is a bright, refreshing complement to the hot and cheesy pizza.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James takes a trip to the stunning Cairngorms National Park, where hes joined by chef pal Nick Nairn. Amongst their adventures, they visit some friendly reindeer and brave the rapids on the River Spey, where they go whitewater rafting. James takes a quad bike through the ancient pine forests, where he meets up with a farmer and his special breed of Highland cattle, which then inspires him to cook a tasty Highland beef carpaccio.

programme.title: Adam Richman Eats Britain
programme.desc: In Aberdeen, Adam tries Aberdeen Angus at one of the citys finest steak restaurants. Later, he checks out meat pies from an award-winning local butcher.

programme.title: Adam Richman Eats Britain
programme.desc: In the Peak District, Adam learns more about the accidental invention of Bakewell pudding. Then, he visits a gastropub for his first taste of local grouse.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Miami, Florida, comfort food like spicy oxtail and big ragu, in Park City, Utah, chivito club and chicken bowl with rice, and a mum and pop ski lodge serving up pork osso buco, vegetarian mushroom stroganoff and crispy pork belly.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Holladay, Utah, pho and bahn mi, in Kailua, Hawaii, island favourites like Hawaiian-style kalbi ribs and mochiko chicken, and in Salt Lake City, Utah, Greek dishes like grilled octopus and lamb tacos.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Waipahu, lechon special and pork adobo fried rice, in Kailua, red curry fish and Mandarin duck confit, in Kaneohe, pan-fried ono and ahi cakes.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.sub-title: Grillin, Chillin and Huli Huli Chicken
programme.desc: In Miami, Florida, smoky fried chicken and Buffalo-style pig wings, in Orange County, California, drunken torta and green chicken chilaquiles, on Oahu, Hawaii, huli huli chicken.

programme.title: Tonight
programme.sub-title: Toxic Legacy: Our Hidden Drug Scandal
programme.desc: Thousands of pregnant women across the UK were for decades prescribed DES, a synthetic hormone that was meant to help prevent miscarriage - the drug left a legacy of life-altering health problems for some of their children that include infertility and rare cancers. ITV Social Affairs Correspondent Sarah Corker investigates a medical scandal that continues to devastate lives and meets the women who say that more must be done to help those exposed to the drug.

programme.title: I Fought the Law: The Ann Ming Story

programme.title: Tonight
programme.sub-title: Toxic Legacy: Our Hidden Drug Scandal
programme.desc: Thousands of pregnant women across the UK were for decades prescribed DES, a synthetic hormone that was meant to help prevent miscarriage - the drug left a legacy of life-altering health problems for some of their children that include infertility and rare cancers. ITV Social Affairs Correspondent Sarah Corker investigates a medical scandal that continues to devastate lives and meets the women who say that more must be done to help those exposed to the drug.

programme.title: I Fought the Law: The Ann Ming Story
programme.desc: Sheridan Smith narrates the story of Julie Hoggs mother Ann Mings fight over 17 years to change an 800-year-old law and finally win justice for her daughter, featuring interviews with family, friends, and retired officers.

programme.title: ITV News at Ten

programme.title: ITV News London

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Carrie learns about the abortion and wastes no time in confronting Kelly, while Carl warns Barraclough not to fall in love. Bob tries to attract clients to Vivs parenting class.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Michelle tackles Liam about Carlas snide comments, Chesney proudly shows off his costume for the school play, while Vera enjoys being an invalid.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Carla warns Michelle not to tell Ryan what she knows, and Ken and Deirdre continue to blame each other for Tracys predicament.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Doc encourages Bert Large to give up plumbing and to open a restaurant, but Berts opening night is far from successful when Martin treats a host of patients with suspected food poisoning the following day. Bert hires a new chef, and passes a health inspection, but customer numbers continue to dwindle until the real cause for the sickness is discovered.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisa finds her new neighbours irritating. Martin and Louisa find their romantic meal ruined by Anthony and Terri Oakwoods sudden arrival.

programme.desc: Kelly loses a modelling job and slaps Carrie when she says its punishment for the abortion. Barraclough turns to Carl for comfort, while Pearl and Jamie attend their interviews.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street

programme.desc: Ken tries to make amends with Deirdre - but she responds by threatening to walk out. Paul has disappeared after a huge argument with Carla.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Portwenn looks set to become a hotbed of passion. Louisa Glassons is furious to discover she has a rival for Dr Martin Ellinghams affections: glamorous divorcee and hotel owner, Carrie Wilson. Can Louisa contain her jealously and claim Martin as her man before Carries flirty tactics take effect?

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Martin and Louisa go out on their first date and she seizes the opportunity for a romantic kiss, but the clumsy doctor manages to ruin the moment with an inappropriate remark. Meanwhile, Louisas friend Hollys condition takes a turn for the worse when she has an allergic reaction to morphine, and Martin has to act quickly to save her life. Louisa is full of admiration for him - and he surprises her by proposing.

programme.desc: When the body of missing fisherman Tommy Stonnall is found tangled in the nets of a North Sea trawler, DCI Vera Stanhope and the team must delve into the lives of his family and a close-knit fishing community.

programme.title: Law and Order: UK
programme.desc: An enquiry is launched when the shocking murder of a teenage girl is shown in an online video. Despite the grainy footage and the lack of a body, the girl and her attackers are identified. However, a vow of silence between the defendants and no further evidence means that Jake and Alesha struggle to assemble a strong case. One key witness could turn that all around, but not without the most personal of sacrifices.

programme.title: Law and Order: UK
programme.desc: On one long gruelling day, the team work flat-out on three separate cases. The day starts early for Ronnie and Sam as they are called to a murder scene in the early hours. Later, they take a 999 call when a sibling dispute turns murderous. Then, a frantic morning takes another turn when an allegation of police intimidation is made against one of the team. The day is no less busy in court for prosecutors Jake and Alesha.

programme.desc: Former FBI criminal profiler Candice DeLong interviews real femmes fatales whose stories have been featured on Investigation Discoverys `Deadly Women. In each episode, DeLong goes behind prison walls to reveal the candid, sometimes shocking story of love and betrayal from the point of view of the woman herself. DeLongs decorated FBI career included tracking terrorists, working under cover as a gangsters moll and hunting for the infamous Unabomber, and it earned her the reputation as the real-life Clarice Starling, the FBI agent at the centre of `Silence of the Lambs and `Hannibal.

programme.desc: Peppa and George realise that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they cant escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.desc: Peppa and George realise that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they cant escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.desc: Peppa and George explore the greenhouse, and it is full of lovely tomatoes and basil. When it is time for dinner, Granny Pig takes all the ingredients they have grown and makes a tasty salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George go sailing with Grandpa Pig, but when he keeps getting stuck in the mud, they all decide to have a sleepover on the boat while they wait for the tide to come back in.

programme.desc: Madame Gazelle sets the children a creative task of making masks. There are carrot masks, robot masks, and even pretty butterfly masks. The only thing missing is lots and lots of glitter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is Molly Moles first day at school and she quick makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit. Molly shows them how good she is at digging while taking them on a tour of her underground house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Its Richard Rabbits birthday party and George is invited. That can only mean one thing, soft play. George and friends have great fun, swinging, bouncing and climbing, but it isnt quite as much fun for the grown-ups.

programme.desc: Peppa and family take a trip to the market to buy some apples, cheese and fish. However, they get more than they were expecting when they stop by Mr Foxs stall as he is selling some special items.

Luckily help is at hand, as Mr Zebra the Postman loves assembling flat-pack furniture.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Its time for playgroup, and Peppa and friends are thinking about what they want to be when they grow up. Some in the group want to be nurses, police officers and even pirates, but Peppa takes a little while to figure out what she wants to be.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The doctor teaches children what to do if there is ever an accident. A patient soon appears and they put into practise the new techniques they have learned.

programme.desc: Tiddles gets stuck in a tree and needs to be rescued. When the turtle falls on Pedros nose, he needs to go to the doctors to make sure everything is ok.

programme.desc: Peppa takes Goldie the Goldfish for a visit to the vets and is surprised when she finds that theres a new road to be built over the building! With the help of Mr. Bull and his brother they find that instead of demolishing the vets they can build a tunnel underneath it.

programme.desc: Peppa and family have all gone to the caves for a day out and Grampy Rabbit is their tour guide. Peppa and George are excited to see the pretty caves and go through the underground lakes. Daddy Pig must be at his bravest on this trip to go on the scary `Ride of Doom.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa and Granny Pig show and share with Peppa and George their toys and hobbies. Granny her special doll from childhood and Grandpa his love of building toy planes. Peppa and George have great fun when Grandpa reveals his new biggest plane ever that even George can fit in.

programme.desc: George, Peppa and Mummy Pig head off to Miss Rabbits clothes shop to get George some brand new clothes. After trying on lots of new exciting outfits George finds an outfit that suits him just right!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa, George, Mummy and Daddy Pig have gone to visit Madame Gazelle. The family soon realise that her house is being pushed over by the tall tree next to it. Mr. Bull arrives and with his help they all manage to save Madame Gazelles House and tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig receives a letter saying he must go away on business to test some very important concrete. Peppa, Mummy and George all decide to go with Daddy and enjoy a train journey, where they sing to pass the time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George to plant, with Daddy Pig helping out by acting as a scarecrow.

programme.desc: Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited. Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and hes bearing gifts. What can they be?

programme.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story to help them fall asleep. When George wakes up again, Peppa has to make up a bedtime story to get him back to sleep.

programme.desc: George pays a visit to Mr Foxs Shop after his favourite toy, Mr Dinosaur, breaks. With all the additional features, surely Dino Roar is a good replacement?

programme.desc: Oh dear, Miss Rabbits train has broken down and all her passengers need to get to work. So Grandpa Pig lends Miss Rabbit his little train, Gertrude.

programme.title: My Grandparents War
programme.desc: Helena explores the story of her maternal grandfather Eduardo Propper de Callejon. A Spanish diplomat, Eduardo defied his governments orders, and helped Jewish people escape the Holocaust as the Nazis invaded France. Helena learns that her paternal grandmother Lady Violet Bonham Carter also took her own stand against anti-Semitism. A mother of four and a liberal politician, Violet was ahead of her time, volunteering as an air raid warden and campaigning for womens rights.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress UK
programme.desc: Keturah has her heart set on a fishtail gown, but her brother suggests a princess look. Meanwhile, Karens dreams for a ball gown may not come true.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress UK
programme.desc: New mum Laura has seen her dream dress online, but will she love its lacey A-line style in real life? Lutifah has two wedding gowns, but fears they wont fit.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.sub-title: The Devil Is in the Details
programme.desc: Niche comes to the salon looking for a stylish gown; Kate is looking for specific details such as tea length, sleeves and vintage; Dawn tries on a one-shouldered gown.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.sub-title: Too Many Cooks in the Kitchen
programme.desc: Buddy Valastros wife, Lisa, is ready to find the perfect dress; Dominique knows exactly what she wants; Jessica is in alterations.

programme.title: Judge Rinders Crime Stories
programme.desc: Judge Robert Rinder examines the story of a volatile relationship that ended with horrifying results, and a devastating crime committed on a 15-week-old baby.

programme.title: Love, Honor, Betray
programme.desc: When Sarah Ripoli was just six years old a terrible event tore her family apart. The discovery of secret writings from beyond the grave helps Sarah to finally understand the shocking truth of what went on between her mum and dad.

programme.title: American Detective With Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: In Pennsylvania, the body of a computer programmer is found submerged in a bathtub. Leads are scarce until detectives uncover a series of troubling voicemails.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: A familys worst nightmare begins when 23-year-old Christina Morris goes missing while out with friends in Plano, Texas. Police franticly search to find her alive, but the discovery of surveillance camera footage reveals the shocking truth.

programme.title: A Killers Mistake
programme.desc: When an alarming number of patients suffer sudden, fatal strokes, detectives follow the clues back to a shocking truth: a serial killer is hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: The lives of a beautiful young family in Long Beach, New York, are ripped apart when five-year-old Audrey witnesses her mother, Diane, brutally stabbed to death. To Audreys horror, her mothers murderer is somebody very close to home.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Vincent Taylor is stuck in a controlling relationship with his Jekyll and Hyde wife. After a violent knife attack results in Vincents death, his wife claims she was the victim of an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: An 82-year-old woman is found murdered in her garage in Wisconsin. A city-wide manhunt follows, and investigators are forced to curb public hysteria.

programme.title: Judge Rinders Crime Stories
programme.desc: A family whose lives were destroyed forever, after a mother of two left her children in the care of her ex-husband. A case of fraudulent activity at the hands of a carer, who took advantage of those she was supposed to look after.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: On July 5, 2011, a young couple on their way home from a night of birthday celebrations is shot while getting gas; with the killers long since vanished, detectives must rely on the grainy gas station video to unravel a senseless act of evil.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: People recount their horrifying true stories about living side-by-side with sociopathic friends or family who go on to commit heinous crimes.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: Shadows of Death
programme.desc: In 1974, 17-year-old Carla Walker is kidnapped. For 45 years the case goes unsolved, and no one knows that the person responsible is hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: When Dalene Carlson vanishes in the night, CCTV footage reveals several suspects, each with a motive. With this footage, police attempt to uncover the truth behind her disappearance.

programme.title: Faking It: Tears of a Crime
programme.desc: Convicted murderer John Cannan is the prime suspect in the disappearance of estate agent Suzy Lamplugh. Experts examine the crucial video evidence.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies, including Buddy, Bats and Darling, get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: To impress his boss, Tim has to find the perfect guest to bring to the bosss annual `Dinner for Extraordinary People, an event where the winner of the evening brings the most eccentric character as his guest. Enter Barry, a man with a passion for dressing mice up in tiny outfits to recreate great works of art.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: While shooting a war film, the director attempts to liven up proceedings by dropping the principle actors into the middle of a real jungle, claiming he is going to capture their performance with hidden cameras. The hapless group including drug-addled comedy star Jeff Portnoy and po-faced method man Kirk Lazarus are completely unaware when a series of unfortunate events leads them into the middle of a real war zone.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: When Set, the Egyptian god of darkness, manages to ascend to the throne of the Egyptian empire. Mortal Bek and the god of the sky Horus join together to save the world and Beks love.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: To impress his boss, Tim has to find the perfect guest to bring to the bosss annual `Dinner for Extraordinary People, an event where the winner of the evening brings the most eccentric character as his guest. Enter Barry, a man with a passion for dressing mice up in tiny outfits to recreate great works of art.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Charlies PI company is approached by Eric Knox, owner of Knox Technologies, whose revolutionary voice-recognition software has been stolen. Angels Natalie, Dylan and Alex are sent to place a bug in the system of bitter rival Roger Corwin, who is under strong suspicion, but after the deed is done, the Angels and their sidekick Bosley face the fact of a destroyed home base as well as Charlies life in immediate danger.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The girls are on the hunt for two gold rings that hold the new identities of every single person who has entered the FBIs Witness Protection Program. When some of them turn up dead, the race is on to find the perpetrators, while using their cunning, guile, martial arts and amazing outfits to get what they want.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Despite having an amazing first date, Bea and Bens initial attraction quickly turns sour. When they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, the pair pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: The Warriors
programme.desc: Wrongly accused of assassinating top gang leader Cyrus at a rally, Coney Islanders The Warriors have to fight their way home over the course of one long, violent night.

programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: After years of suppressed rage, an underground fighter discovers a way to infiltrate the enclave of the citys sinister elite. He soon embarks on an explosive campaign of retribution to settle the score with the men who took everything from him.

programme.title: Shaolin Soccer
programme.desc: A football coach persuades a kung-fu master, who has trouble finding work, and his former classmates to transfer their skills and form a team.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A Mexican village is at the mercy of Calvera, the leader of a band of outlaws. The townspeople, too afraid to fight for themselves, hire seven American gunslingers to free them from the bandits raids. The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: ‫When his mentor and close friend is murdered, an elite assassins next assignment is self-imposed - he wants those responsible dead.‬

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma, having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Nuclear Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race and sees the android, which is made from Kryptonite, as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Loose-cannon cops Lowrey and Burnett reduce Miami to rubble as they try to stop Cuban and Russian drug smugglers from flooding Florida with ecstasy.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: ‫As the nation states Euromerica and New Shanghai vie for supremacy, factory worker Doug Quaid begins to suspect that hes a spy, though he is unaware which side of the fight hes on.‬

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: After he accidentally destroys the winter food supply of his fellow Liberty Park residents, a squirrel is banished to the streets of Oakton. Luckily, he finds the towns nut shop and hatches a plan to plunder its bounty. However, unbeknown to the squirrel and his ragtag team of animal associates, the nut shop is really a front for mobsters who plan to rob the bank next door. While the squirrel and his team break in to the shop, the mobsters carry out their own scheme.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.title: Pils Adventures
programme.desc: Pil, a little orphan, lives in the streets of the city of Roc-en-Brume. With her three tamed weasels, she survives by stealing food from the castle of the sinister regent who usurps the throne.

programme.desc: In spring, woodland friends awaken from their winter nap to discover new human neighbours in their once-natural habitat. While an opportunistic raccoon shows them how to exploit the new suburban bounty, some of the animals are suspicious.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teenage daughter.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.desc: When his wickedness is challenged, super-villain Gru hatches a plan to steal the Moon. Enlisting three young orphans to help out, his dastardly plot is derailed when he begins to care for them.

programme.desc: Elizabeth kills her husband because she wants to be with her young lover Ray, but she feels insecure because of the age gap between them. She is then drawn in by a flyer for an anti-ageing process known as the Gift of Beauty.

programme.desc: On a wet Saturday, Mr Princey learns that his unbalanced daughter Millicent has hit and killed the man with whom she was obsessed with a croquet mallet. Mr Princey cannot afford a scandal at any cost and endeavours to cover it up.

programme.desc: A mistress confronts her rich lovers wife, hoping to convince the woman to give her husband a divorce.

programme.desc: A sheriff worries about the safety of two elderly hermits, knowing there is an escaped killer on the loose.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Having arranged the death of her very wealthy husband in order to be with her lover Stephen, Olivia becomes increasingly annoyed by a perceived lack of appreciation for what she has done.

programme.sub-title: I Like It Here in Wilmington
programme.desc: A clothing manufacturer finds himself on the verge of bankruptcy thanks to his business partners lack of foresight in predicting the next seasons trends. To maintain his lifestyle, he ponders the idea of murdering his wife for the insurance money.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Steve and Jane are a couple of thieves who travel the country pretending to be market researchers for Silvertone metal polish whilst they find suitable homes to burglarise and soon meet the eccentric Percy, rumoured to have a hidden fortune.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A woman plots the murder of her penny-pinching uncle with the help of her actress boarder.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents

programme.desc: When Trojan prince Paris woos Helen, Queen of Sparta, away from her husband Menelaus, the legendary warrior Achilles is called to lead the armies of Greece against the city fortress of Troy.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481 BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

When a big dance competition is announced, he wrangles the beautiful and talented Stephanie to be his partner. As the two train for the big night, they start to fall for each other as well.

programme.title: The Wimbledon Kidnapping
programme.desc: On 29 December 1969, Muriel McKay disappeared from her suburban home in Wimbledon. Such was the strangeness of the case that everyone from the police, family, Fleet Street, and hundreds of clairvoyants all struggled to decipher the vanishing of the respectable 55-year-old housewife. Now, one of the men convicted for this extraordinary crime, and the families of both the kidnapped woman and the convicted murderers speak for the first time.

programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Money Train

The twins decide to borrow McCoggins special clockwork rollerskates to put the cogs back, but the skates zoom out of control.

programme.title: Tickety Toc

With Tommy banging his drum and Tallulah blowing on her trumpet, soon everyone is lifting, running, puffing, and panting. They are all so exhausted that they fall fast asleep, but with Chime Time imminent, they must find a way to wake up Puffertys wheels.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: When Hopparoo bursts all their bubbles with his sharp ears, the twins use McCoggins extra-strong bubble mixture instead and blow a bubble so huge that it engulfs Battersby, Madame Au Lait, McCoggins, Lopsiloo, Chikidee, and finally Tommy and Tallulah themselves. The twins will need to find Hopparoo, as only his sharp ears can free them for Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah love dressing up and surprising each other with their crazy costumes, but Hopparoo is not impressed when they decide to surprise everybody else in town, too. programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Hopparoo finds himself disappointed during Measuring Time, leaving Tommy and Tallulah to offer up ideas about how to add inches, but a super-tall rabbit rampaging through town on stilts can only cause chaos.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah are playing pirates as they hunt for Madame Au Laits treasure, but rival pirate Hopparoo keeps trying to commandeer their cardboard boat by telling them it is Chime Time, causing them twice to abandon ship and run. programme.title: Tickety Toc

Earths billions of inhabitants are unaware that the planet has an expiration date. With the warnings of an American scientist, world leaders begin secret preparations for the survival of select members of society. When the global cataclysm finally occurs, failed writer Jackson Curtis tries to lead his family to safety as the world starts falling apart.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A group of scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal them. Only one man survives. He has two aims: to find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.desc: Frank Lampards Derby go to Elland Road for the second leg of their 2018-19 Sky Bet Championship play-off semi-final with Marcelo Bielsas Leeds, with the odds stacked against them.

programme.desc: Two matches of Sky Bet League 1 semi-final play-off action couldnt separate Charlton Athletic and Doncaster Rovers in 2019, as a date at Wembley hinged on a dramatic penalty shootout.

programme.title: The Line
programme.desc: A university student lives life without fear of consequences.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: ‫In this epic outlaw tale, the loyalty of three brothers is put to the test against the backdrop of the nations most notorious crime wave.‬

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Two estranged friends unveil a dangerous and deceptive plot that forever changes their lives.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: Mobster moll Gloria, fresh out of prison, finds shes the guardian of Nicky, just six years of age but the only one with the information that will finger her ex Kevin who put her inside, and see him get his just desserts (and her some of his dough).

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder in Paris Louvre Museum and cryptic clues in some of Leonardo da Vincis most famous paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery. For 2,000 years a secret society closely guards information that -- should it come to light -- could rock the very foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his familys ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realise theyre at the centre of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who murdered five people, apparently at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of US soldiers.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: One mans brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after its revealed hes a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Though Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr. Fletcher, there remains one still submerged who is set to materialize and dominate all of the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls led by the wilful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him as the walls between his compartments shatter.

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: The disturbing story of the making of the infamous 60s underworld figures Reggie and Ronnie Kray - from their upbringing by a domineering mother in the deprivation of Londons East End. The gangland empire they build is characterised by violence and intimidation, and the film is unflinching in its depiction of their rise to power.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: When a widowed single mother claims her dead husband is attempting to kill her from beyond the grave, McCall and the team help uncover the truth.

programme.desc: When a bus full of American volunteers is hijacked in a dangerous section of Morocco, the team works to locate the missing aid workers and the people who kidnapped them.

programme.desc: Immigration questions a young British woman returning to Australia from New Zealand. Two young Japanese travellers returning home are suspected of wildlife smuggling.

programme.desc: The revelation of the shocking fact that friends and spouses, are nothing more than masked strangers, dwelling behind a phony pile of lies, sometimes just needs one game.

programme.desc: A mans mission to reunite his ailing grandmother with her ancestral home turns into a complicated cross-border affair.

programme.desc: A bomb disposal expert becomes bitter and lonely and is unable to fall in love until he is forced to deal with his past.

programme.desc: A young field agent is picked from the Prime Ministers office for a top-secret mission to crack down on terrorism and corruption.

programme.desc: A convict serving a life sentence escapes prison but ends up finding he is being pursued by more than just the police.

programme.title: Prem Qaidi

programme.title: Conversation With Rajkummar Rao 2

programme.desc: Old friends Balaram and Dharamraj arrange the marriage of their young children to cement their friendship. But years later the situation changes as the daughter refuses to accept the match.

programme.desc: A prince who grew up in the jungle seeks revenge after learning of his royal familys long-ago murders.

programme.title: Patthar Ke Sanam
programme.desc: A prank backfires when two best friends realise that they both love the same man.

programme.desc: Shekhar is a straight-laced killjoy firmly tied to his mothers apron strings. Until, that is, he meets the gorgeous Raj Kumari. Soon, Shekhar throws caution to the wind and falls madly in love. Renowned for its foot-tapping soundtrack, fabulous choreography and exuberant performances.

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan Titchmarsh heads to Birmingham to surprise Georgie Moseley - the founder of Britains first cancer drop-in centre. Dedicated to her son Harry, who she sadly lost to brain cancer when he was just 11, the Drop In Centre provides support to families coping with a cancer diagnosis. At Georgies home, inspired by where the Moseley family spent their final holiday together with Harry, the team transforms her grim backyard into an Ibizan-style hideaway full of happy reminders of Harry.

programme.title: Edwardian Farm
programme.desc: It is April and the fishing season has arrived - a time when Devons `fisherman-farmers went to sea. Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn go to sea in an Edwardian trawler, hastily finishing repairs before setting sail. They master the singing of sea shanties as well as steering a wind-powered vessel and casting a net the old-fashioned way - but will they catch any fish?

programme.title: Tales from the Green Valley
programme.desc: May is the teams ninth month and the they are behind with spring sowing, so they get busy trying to cut straight furrows with a breastplough, before harrowing their peas.

programme.title: Alan Cummings Edge of Scotland
programme.desc: Scottish-born actor Alan Cumming explores the picturesque Outer Hebrides of Scotland, touring the Western Isles from Barra to Stornoway on Lewis, Eriskay and the Callanish stones. He meets native islanders and discovers remote communities along the way, learning about their lives on the outskirts of Scotland. On his journey he visits a standing stone circle older than Stonehenge and uncovers its ancient history, plays a game of football on a world famous pitch, and learns the real story behind `Whisky Galore.

programme.title: Flipping Profit
programme.desc: Antiques auctioneer Catherine Southon, wheeler dealer Tony Wong and upholsterer extraordinaire Micaela Sharp head to Faversham to find some bargains they can turn into some flipping profit. Sure, theyll find some items in its antique shops, scrap yards and flea markets, but will they be able to flip them for a healthy profit?

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine

Tearfully, Heptonstall tells them he wants to go to the churchyard and bury a very dear friend.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine

programme.title: Hi-De-Hi!

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Arkwright takes action when his corner shop is broken into and employs a large dog to guard his property. Unfortunately, the unruly creature is more successful at keeping customers at bay than frightening any burglars who may be about.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Pearl throws Howard out of the house, but when he goes to Cleggs for sympathy it falls on deaf ears. Pearl tells Nelly shes going to have to sort out Howard once and for all. programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Rights of Man (Except for Howard)
programme.desc: Hobbo decides that the still-homeless Howard needs to show Pearl whos boss, but after Pearl slams the door in his face, Howard is despondent. programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: In a bid to breathe new life into forgotten towns, Italian municipalities are selling empty homes for one euro. Fulfilling a long-held ambition, Amanda purchases two dilapidated apartments in picture perfect Salemi and convinces best friend Alan to spend a summer renovating them, with the aim to create an Italian dream home. Arriving at the crumbling property for the first time, seeing the piles of rubbish and abandoned junk, it dawns on them that this is no holiday.

programme.desc: Louis Theroux visits Fresno in California to take a look at how crystal meth addiction is affecting the local community.
